title: Phishing L1 – Zero‑hour – SWG Audit
description: Phishing Level 1: URL filters and zero‑hour check. Known‑phishing blocklist test. Blocklist coverage is vendor‑dependent.
keywords: SWG Audit, phishing level 1, zero‑hour, URL filters, blocklist, PAN‑DB
headline: Phishing – Level 1: Known phishing
subline: Validate blocklist coverage for known phishing URLs. Blocklist coverage is vendor‑dependent.
instructions: Configure the perimeter to allow this site. Security must block access to known phishing URLs. Blocklist coverage is vendor‑dependent.
feedbackFail: If the known‑phishing link loads, perimeter may have failed for this feed.
feedbackPass: If the link is blocked, perimeter passed.
